title: Stuck in log in screen.
body:
When I tried to log in today my client just gets stuck after authenticating my account. I've let it sit for awhile and it just stays in the same screen, I tried logging in on another account and it does the same thing, any help would be appreciated.

https://gyazo.com/6f17c92ce0ac94695b62e39b8e233de3

replies.body:
Thanks for the screenshot!  It seems like your network might be getting blocked from reaching the authentication server, so you can't log in.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.

You can also grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure your firewall settings in case that might be the culprit.  I hope that helps!
I'll give it a try, not doing too much today on my day off anyway lol.

So I just reinstalled the game and the same thing happened, but after loading for 2 minutes the client loaded and now I'm logged in. I guess you can try reinstalling as well, I'm pretty sure something in the game files has changed to cause this to happen since completely uninstalling the game and deleting league folder with fresh install fixed the issue. Hope it works for you as well.
I saw a rioter asking you to check something on your end but I didn't really know how to go about doing the same myself not super savi with computers.  Just odd all this randomly happened.

I'm having exact same issue. I can't log in to any of my accounts on euw and eune. I ran hextech repair tool, did entire connection troubleshoot twice and nothing seems to be fixing the issue. I read from other posts that reinstalling the game won't help fixing this so I didn't try reinstalling it yet. I played the game without any problems just 10 hours ago.
Didn't have any issues around 12 hours ago.  I'm not sure there's a fix but an explanation would be nice :<

Something is going on. I've been having the same issue for the past week and haven't been able to play. i've submitted and ticket and created a thread here, myself. What area do you live in and what ISP do you have?

Gotcha. Yeah idk dude. It's really annoying..especially when i've had time to play and can't log in for the past week. i'm in Houston, tx and have comcast, so i suppose it's not just specific to my ISP/area.
